body_html:
I guess you need to add the import library to the link command.
Find this file tensorflow\bazel-bin\tensorflow\libtensorflow.so.if.lib

only liblibtensorflow.so liblibtensorflow.so.ifso libtensorflow.so libtensorflow.so-2.params and libtensorflow.so.runfiles_manifest

body:
> I guess you need to add the import library to the link command.
> Find this file `tensorflow\bazel-bin\tensorflow\libtensorflow.so.if.lib`

only `liblibtensorflow.so`  `liblibtensorflow.so.ifso` `libtensorflow.so` `libtensorflow.so-2.params` and `libtensorflow.so.runfiles_manifest`
